titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2224) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1988 for the Panama Canal Commission to operate and maintain the Panama Canal, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-389.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 404 - 1 (Record Vote No: 377).

bill.summary: 10/23/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2224 (Panama Canal Commission funding).
